name: magic-bounce
caption: Magic Bounce

effect.short: Reflects most non-damaging moves back at their user.
effect.full:
When this Pokémon is targeted by a move flagged as being reflectable, the move is redirected to its user.

All reflectable moves are non-damaging, and most non-damaging moves that target other Pokémon are reflectable.

A move reflected by this ability or []{move:magic-coat} cannot be reflected back.

flavorText:
Reflects status moves, instead of getting hit
by them.
